//Hanna - this file renders a button that calls the decrementer from the provider
import React,{useContext}from'react';import{CounterContext}from'../../contexts/counter-provider-context';var Decrementer=function Decrementer(){var context=useContext(CounterContext);return React.createElement("button",{onClick:context.decrement},"Decrement");};export default Decrementer;
